content: Vista is a website to promote luxury apartments between Montreux and Brent. On this project with my studio Les Animals, I participated in the development. Like many of the studio's projects, it is based on a custom WordPress theme, complete with Twig, SASS, and JavaScript.
My first project at Les Animals. Certif Pro is a joint association serving the professional retraining of private sector employees. I benefited from a great autonomy to develop this WordPress.
At FCINQ, I was able to discover Nuxt.js thanks to a blindtest for Sourdoreille, called "Qui est Kick ?". On this mission, I was in charge of the front-end development from a Figma mockup.

The Series Mania festival went digital and I was able to take part in the front-end development within FCINQ. A WordPress adapted to the constraints of the festival to have to broadcast live or replay, as well as to offer reservations for sessions.
During an internship at FCINQ, I was able to bring evolutions to this already existing Comt√© branded WordPress.

A unique experience for an important subject. The French National Cancer Institute asked FCINQ to promote the vaccination against the human papillomavirus. I took part in the front-end technical realization through a site powered by GSAP.

For the CHOPARD Automobile group, I was entrusted with highlighting the possibility of making a covering on a Mercedes Benz Actros truck. In 5 days, I designed and coded an interactive experience for the user, with a bit of 3D. ü™Ñ

I created a web application for my school, ESADD, to digitize the management of student attendance during classes, with a front-office for students and lecturers as well as a back-office for the management. All of this was done in the most streamlined and efficient user experience possible.

During 5 days, we had to produce, with two others ESADD students, a promotional video of the new electric engine of DS3 Crossback. Through DS Automobiles, it was necessary thanks to After Effects to highlight the transition to electric.
